hero.description: I love diving deep into the world of technology and innovation. With solid experience in Javascript, Typescript, ReactJS, Next and Node.js, I am always ready to offer innovative, high-quality solutions that help companies achieve their business goals.

projects.title: My projects
projects.description: Here some of my projects, you can find more in my

EventFlow.title: EventFlow
EventFlow.description: A web application for collecting and managing event leads. (Under development)

PeriniCabinets.title: Perini Cabinets
PeriniCabinets.description: An e-commerce of custom furniture, developed for a client. The project of meeting and welcoming customers every day.

DoBrasil.title: DoBrasil
DoBrasil.description: A web application for campaign management, where you can buy raffle tickets and compete for prizes. It was a platform developed for a client, but it was discontinued and taken offline.

DEJORD.title: DEJORD
DEJORD.description: Project developed at college, work we developed for DEJORD (Desafio Jovem do Rio Doce), an institution for rehabilitation of drug addicts. An application for patient and team management.

IgniteCall.title: Ignite Call
IgniteCall.description: The Ignite Call project is a scheduling application that allows users to share their calendar and allow others to reserve available time slots. The application also integrates with Google Calendar to view schedules on different platforms. We developed this project using a customized Design System.

Habits.title: Habits
Habits.description: Habits is an app for daily task tracking that helps users monitor their completed and uncompleted activities. The user registers desired habits, specifying the days of the week they should be performed. Each day, a list of habits is generated for the user to mark the status of each one. Daily progress is displayed on a progress bar and through the colors of squares representing the days, with lighter colors indicating a higher number of completed habits. The application includes a backend, web, and mobile versions.

DevStore.title: DevStore
DevStore.description: A project to better understand E2E testing using Cypress.

about.title: About me
about.biography: Hello, my name is Filipe Vieira da Silva, and I am a Full Stack Developer. I was born and raised in Brazil. With 2 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, I possess skills that range from initial conception to final implementation. I work both for the company I am employed with and as a freelancer. My interest is not limited to just formal employment; I am always on the lookout to create and develop new micro SaaS (Software as a Service) and independent projects. These side endeavors not only hone my skills but also allow me to explore new ideas and innovative solutions to everyday problems. I believe technology has the power to transform lives and businesses. I am eager to collaborate with teams and projects that share this vision and are in search of a developer who brings both technical knowledge and a creative perspective to the table. If you are looking for someone who can combine technical competency with a creative approach to software development, let's talk. Together, we can turn ideas into reality.

continuous_learning.title: Continuous Learning
